fullplot: A poor and alienated young man (Farley Granger) who is driven to murder when a priest refuses to give is deceased mother an expensive funeral. The film explores the crippling poverty that has prevented the youth from marrying or providing his mother with enough comforts, and has led to his crime. Dana Andrews plays the compassionate assistant of the slain priest who brings about the tormented killer's repentance.
plot: A mentally unbalanced young man kills a priest. One of the priest's colleagues sets out to find the killer.
title: Edge of Doom
